1.0.0.en: added ducobox silent connect, roomsensor RH and boxsensor RH

1.1.0.en: added flow action card to change the ventilation state

1.2.0.en: FIX: for a ducobox without a humidity box sensor; NEW: added air quality co2 box and room sensor devices; NEW: added flow triggers for box and sensors

1.2.1.en: Fixed an issue with the flow action 'Change ventilation state to'

1.4.0.en: added support for duco box focus, co2 valve and humidity valve + some bugfixes for other senors

1.5.0.en: added new devices: user-control and valve. added ventilation capabilities for room sensors. and some minor improvements.

1.5.1.en: added new devices: user-control and valve. added ventilation capabilities for room sensors. and some minor improvements.

1.6.0.en: Added support for new device co2-humidity-valve. Added flow condition cards for state and mode.

1.7.0.en: fixed an issue with the same capability values and fixed some connectivity issues

1.8.0.en: added device status indicators for co2 air quality, rh air quality and flow level target values

1.9.0.en: added autodiscovery for ducobox and added a new setting to use http instead of https

1.10.0.en: remote switch widget can be used for all devices with 'ventilation_state' capability

1.11.0.en: added support for RH and Co2 values
